subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Anze Kopitar scored on a breakaway 8 minutes 13 seconds into overtime, giving the Kings, who extended their N.H.L.-record road winning streak to nine games this postseason, a victory over the Devils.
snippet: Anze Kopitar scored on a breakaway 8 minutes 13 seconds into overtime, giving the Kings, who extended their N.H.L.-record road winning streak to nine games this postseason, a victory over the Devils.
